meanings.sent1: The untried recipe seemed risky to cook.
meanings.sent2: The untried path through the forest was unknown to the hikers.
meanings.sent3: The untried chef decided to make a cake without a recipe.
meanings.sent4: Her untried skills in painting blossomed unexpectedly.
meanings.sent5: The untried medicine had uncertain effects on the patient.

meanings.sent1: The untried roller coaster made me nervous.
meanings.sent2: The untried swimmer hesitated before jumping into the pool.
meanings.sent3: The untried actor forgot their lines during the play.
meanings.sent4: His untried theory challenged the existing beliefs.
meanings.sent5: The untried student excelled in the difficult subject.
